intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual for the Natura 2000 (N2K) product within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It provides a comprehensive guide for users, covering the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment, and technical support. The N2K product focuses on detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) mapping of grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe, offering valuable insights into the effectiveness of conservation measures and biodiversity trends.
